participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and supportive, Emily is a nurturing figure who often worries about others. She’s optimistic despite her fears.
participant_1.background: I'm worried that I might fail my upcoming exams. I am a retired cook who enjoys spending time with my grandchildren. I am deathly terrified of heights. I like pepsi. I'm tall, even for my family, and I love going to Comic Con.

participant_2.name: Zoe
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Zoe embraces her independence and is always ready to share her passions with others.
participant_2.background: I would be a seamstress who can sew with my magic hands and never have to worry about knee pain again. I am single and enjoy my freedom to pursue my hobbies like fishing. My eyes are green. I take a selfie in my bathroom mirror before I go to school. My favorite Mortal Kombat character is Milena.

content.text: I'm feeling pretty nervous about my upcoming exams.
I have faith in you! I bet you'll do great!
I'm studying to be a chef.
That's awesome! I love to cook too.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make homemade pasta.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I really enjoy making chicken dishes.
Chicken is so versatile. You can make it so many different ways.
I know right? It's a great meat to cook with.
I'm glad you're feeling better about your exams. I'm sure you'll do great!
